nanda disanayaka manikegodallahena - magulagamarathnapura disthi්rakkaye kalawana mathiwarana kottasaye kodippilikanda ga්rama niladhari wasamata ayath mahapathwila - balegala pa්radeshayata me wana thek thapal pahasukam laba di natha.me pa්radeshaye ayata labena lipi laba ganima sandaha kilomitar hathaka pamana dura gos nawalakanda thapal karyalayen laba gatha yuthuya.samahara awasthawala widuli paniwuda pawa labenuye dina 4 k ho 5 k pamana pa්ramada wimen pasuwaya.lipi bedannaku laba dena lesa illa sitiya da thawamath eya ituwi natha.me ape gamata thapal bedannaku laba dena lesa karana illimaki.apa ipadunu deshayata naya nowanna, barak nowanna nam sha්ri lankika apa siyalu dena rajayata niyamitha badu gewiya yuthuya.

jaliya alewikaranaya pilibadawa lowa dhanawatheku wana bil getas dakwana lada adahasa - 2017 shri lankawe jaliya alewikaranaya[sanskaranaya] jaliya alewikaranaya pilibadawa igena ganima kala yuththe ayi - 2017 shri lankawe jaliya alewikaranaya pilibadawa tharana parapura menma wadihiti ayawalunda dakwanne menma ee desa balanneda ithamath patu aakarayakin wima thuladi ewan rataka duppathun kisidu dineka dhanapathiyan washayenda,ratak dhanawath ratak washayenda,sanwardhanayak kara noyanu atha.eyata mulika hethawa wanne mema jaliya alewi karanaya pilibada maha janathawa dakwana biya wiya haka.eya sadharana wanne sama ayekuma pahe diyunuwa sadaha aasawen bala sitiyada kapati piramida karawange grahanayata nathuwima nisa mema wadagath wruththiyada hri lankawa thuladi ithamath awasanawantha thathwayakata muhuna di atha.eya niwaradi aakarayen wataha gatha yuththe anagatha parapura desa mema waradi konaya niwaradi kara dima kalochitha piyawarak washayeni.meyata hodama udaharanaya washayen lowa dhanawatheku wana makkroshopt nirmathru bil gets pawasanne thama wyaparayan wethin labena dhanaya nathiwi giya hoth thaman mulasita nawatha patan ganne jaliya alewi karanayen bawaya.
"moko me ada yanne nadda?"
10) thamage katayuthu pilibanda wagakima bhara noganima boho sambandhathawaladi pirimin thama athin sidu wana waradi bhara ganimata mali kamak dakwayi.
